channel.title: Player saving? + others
channel.description:
No idea my base source, ill give link to what i got. http://www.roon server.org/runescape-development/google/downloads/219499-317-server-client-cache-3.html#post2534804
Well the source is a piece of shit but im trying to make it better. well, when I log in an account theres always random items, and usually some over the max limit of the 317 cache, so i removed that, but when I log in now theres all dwarf remains in equip tab.
Dwarf remains in equip tab (FIXED) How I fixed: go to player.java, search random until it comes to like a playerequipment with random, and delete that ad make it -1.
I log out and it says error writing file could not save for: player
Player saving (not fixed)
Following doesn't work
Following (not fixed)

item.title: Player saving? + others
item.dc:creator: @kingman002 kingman002
item.description:
@kingman002 wrote:

No idea my base source, ill give link to what i got. http://www.roon server.org/runescape-development/google/downloads/219499-317-server-client-cache-3.html#post2534804

Well the source is a piece of shit but im trying to make it better. well, when I log in an account theres always random items, and usually some over the max limit of the 317 cache, so i removed that, but when I log in now theres all dwarf remains in equip tab.

Dwarf remains in equip tab (FIXED)
How I fixed: go to player.java, search random until it comes to like a playerequipment with random, and delete that ad make it -1.

I log out and it says error writing file
could not save for: player

Player saving (not fixed)

Following doesnâ€™t work
